ComicInfo.Title: Order from Chaos, Part 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
Recent events have strained many relationships amongst the TMNT and their allies. Many must decide whether to trust or to betray, to separate or to stay, and to love or to hate. Time takes its toll, but where do the Turtles go from here?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Michael Dialynas | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ben Bishop | 3 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 4 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 5 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover (Michelangelo), Limited to 600 | Robert Atkins & Simon Gough | 6-8 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover (Splinter), Limited to 300 | Robert Atkins & Simon Gough | 9-11 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover (Vintage Michelangelo), Limited to 100 | Robert Atkins & Simon Gough | 12-14 | 2nd | Second Printing Variant B&W Cover | Kevin Eastman | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:40:45. [CVDB516841]
